019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.PlotSquared;
023import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
024import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
025import com.plotsquared.core.database.DBFunc;
026import com.plotsquared.core.events.TeleportCause;
027import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
028import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
029import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
030import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
031import com.plotsquared.core.plot.world.PlotAreaManager;
032import com.plotsquared.core.util.EventDispatcher;
033import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
034import com.plotsquared.core.util.PlayerManager;
035import com.plotsquared.core.util.TabCompletions;
036import com.plotsquared.core.util.WorldUtil;
037import com.sk89q.worldedit.world.gamemode.GameModes;
038import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
039import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
040import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
041import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
042
043import java.util.Collection;
044import java.util.Collections;
045import java.util.UUID;
046import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;
047
048@CommandDeclaration(command = "deny",
049        aliases = {"d", "ban"},
050        usage = "/plot deny <player>",
051        category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
052        requiredType = RequiredType.PLAYER)
053public class Deny extends SubCommand {
054
055    private final PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager;
056    private final EventDispatcher eventDispatcher;
057    private final WorldUtil worldUtil;
058
059    @Inject
060    public Deny(
061            final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager,
062            final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher,
063            final @NonNull WorldUtil worldUtil
064    ) {
065        super(Argument.PlayerName);
066        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
067        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
068        this.worldUtil = worldUtil;
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public boolean onCommand(PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
073
074        Location location = player.getLocation();
075        final Plot plot = location.getPlotAbs();
076        if (plot == null) {
077            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
078            return false;
079        }
080        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
081            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_unowned"));
082            return false;
083        }
084        if (!plot.isOwner(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
085                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_DENY)) {
086            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms"));
087            return true;
088        }
089
090        int maxDenySize = Permissions.hasPermissionRange(player, Permission.PERMISSION_DENY, Settings.Limit.MAX_PLOTS);
091        int size = plot.getDenied().size();
092        if (size >= maxDenySize) {
093            player.sendMessage(
094                    TranslatableCaption.of("members.plot_max_members_denied"),
095                    TagResolver.resolver("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(size)))
096            );
097            return false;
098        }
099
100        PlayerManager.getUUIDsFromString(args[0], (uuids, throwable) -> {
101            if (throwable instanceof TimeoutException) {
102                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("players.fetching_players_timeout"));
103            } else if (throwable != null || uuids.isEmpty()) {
104                player.sendMessage(
105                        TranslatableCaption.of("errors.invalid_player"),
106                        TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[0])))
107                );
108            } else {
109                for (UUID uuid : uuids) {
110                    if (uuid == DBFunc.EVERYONE && !(
111                            Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_DENY_EVERYONE) || Permissions
112                                    .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_DENY))) {
113                        player.sendMessage(
114                                TranslatableCaption.of("errors.invalid_player"),
115                                TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[0])))
116                        );
117                    } else if (plot.isOwner(uuid)) {
118                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("deny.cant_remove_owner"));
119                        return;
120                    } else if (plot.getDenied().contains(uuid)) {
121                        player.sendMessage(
122                                TranslatableCaption.of("member.already_added"),
123                                TagResolver.resolver(
124                                        "player",
125                                        Tag.inserting(PlayerManager.resolveName(uuid).toComponent(player))
126                                )
127                        );
128                        return;
129                    } else {
130                        if (uuid != DBFunc.EVERYONE) {
131                            plot.removeMember(uuid);
132                            plot.removeTrusted(uuid);
133                        }
134                        plot.addDenied(uuid);
135                        this.eventDispatcher.callDenied(player, plot, uuid, true);
136                        if (!uuid.equals(DBFunc.EVERYONE)) {
137                            handleKick(PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(uuid), plot);
138                        } else {
139                            for (PlotPlayer<?> plotPlayer : plot.getPlayersInPlot()) {
140                                // Ignore plot-owners
141                                if (plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
142                                    continue;
143                                }
144                                handleKick(plotPlayer, plot);
145                            }
146                        }
147                    }
148                }
149                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("deny.denied_added"));
150            }
151        });
152
153        return true;
154    }
155
156    @Override
157    public Collection<Command> tab(final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args, final boolean space) {
158        return TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, String.join(",", args).trim(), Collections.emptyList());
159    }
160
161    private void handleKick(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot) {
162        plot = plot.getBasePlot(false);
163        if (player == null) {
164            return;
165        }
166        if (!plot.equals(player.getCurrentPlot())) {
167            return;
168        }
169        if (player.hasPermission("plots.admin.entry.denied")) {
170            return;
171        }
172        if (player.getGameMode() == GameModes.SPECTATOR) {
173            player.stopSpectating();
174        }
175        Location location = player.getLocation();
176        Location spawn = this.worldUtil.getSpawn(location.getWorldName());
177        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("deny.you_got_denied"));
178        if (plot.equals(spawn.getPlot())) {
179            Location newSpawn = this.worldUtil.getSpawn(this.plotAreaManager.getAllWorlds()[0]);
180            if (plot.equals(newSpawn.getPlot())) {
181                // Kick from server if you can't be teleported to spawn
182                // Use string based message here for legacy uses
183                player.kick("You got kicked from the plot! This server did not set up a loaded spawn, so you got " +
184                        "kicked from the server.");
185            } else {
186                player.teleport(newSpawn, TeleportCause.DENIED);
187            }
188        } else {
189            player.teleport(spawn, TeleportCause.DENIED);
190        }
191    }
192
193}
